name: sniffily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows disapproval and a low opinion: I'm not just being sniffily dismissive here. We sniffily turned down an invitation to join them for dinner.
More examplesFewer examplesMathematicians sniffily refused to consider his conclusion as anything but a guess.He sniffily dismissed the new newspaper column as a "gimmick".This is a classic example of a masterpiece that has been regarded sniffily by experts.My mother smiled insincerely at a couple of old ladies at the table opposite, and they turned sniffily away.
